short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculator for working out margin percentages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension will allow you to work out the percentage difference between two numbers.
just input the numbers into the fields provided hit calculate. It's that simple.
